channel.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
channel.description:
I vote yes. Who really cares if people do it? Most 360 users on cod4 use a mod. I have one myself.
Just wondering what you think!
They patched god mode FML.
Oh well.

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:42, topic:281590”][quote author=Square link=topic=372014.msg2810701#msg2810701 date=1243974920]
They’re irritating. Anyone who can’t complete anything on their own and uses something other than their own skill is fail.
[/quote]
Maybe one of their skills is hacking?[/quote]Maybe it’s not. Actually, I’d bet that more than 80% of the cheaters have no experience in hacking at all; they just youtube it.

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:44, topic:281590”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=372014.msg2824713#msg2824713 date=1244879682]
maybe one of my skills is being able to use a weapon but in a fist fight against someone that would make it unfair wouldnt it
[/quote]

Fighting is fighting, don’t you fight to win?[/quote]
what about in boxing then? how often do you see one of them pick up a chair and hit the other?

Read full topic

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @united0wnage united0wnage
item.description:
@united0wnage wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:40, topic:281590”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=372014.msg2813231#msg2813231 date=1244131025]

If you can’t play a game well with out cheating you shouldn’t play the game.

So we should all quit runescape?

i dont play it so that shouldnt be hard

by we i meant all the people who cheat.

The thing is that cheating in an MMO doesnt ruin anyone elses experience does it? cheating in COD4 however does. Any other player in runescape wont care if you have xxx million gp but in an online game someone will care if you have xxx kills just on them because you cheated
[/quote]

Look at runescape now, it’s almost ruined because of RWT, It doesn’t help that loads of people auto for cash.[/quote]

EXACTLY. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @united0wnage united0wnage
item.description:
@united0wnage wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:16, topic:281590”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=372014.msg2810448#msg2810448 date=1243967247]

If the people who write the servers for these games new shit all about security, it wouldn’t be an issue.

Sometimes your can mod controllers (eg xbox360 controller for rapid fire on most games :D)

Cheating on multiplayer games are just stupid.

Your on a runescape cheating website!
[/quote]
Scar isn’t the worst cheating, Auto-aim and Wall-hack is the worst type of cheating, botting is just make your computer doing something you could done self, but don’t have time to do.[/quote]

I don’t use that shit. You’re bringing up a whole bunch of mods i never even mentioned/use. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2009, 06:51:50 am[/size][hr][quote=“Uriko, post:32, topic:281590”]I didn’t read any other post when I replied, I was referring directly to the topic. People have pretty much summed up my views in retort, anyway please united0wnage point out where I said all cheating is gay.

(Just to restate) Cheating in an MMO to increase skills is far different than directly cheating against other players.[/quote]

Yet, it levels you up faster, gets you more money then the other legitimate players have. I belive that give youy a major advantage over the rest of the legit players. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2009, 06:53:56 am[/size][hr]I’m honestly surprised this topic got so many views/replies. xD

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Following on from that, if the cheating in an MMO were to be equivalent to that of the cheating being done that you are describing the cheats would involve actively killing the player when they cant do anything about it or taking their items or dropping their levels whilst they have no defence against this kind of attack

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

I didn’t read any other post when I replied, I was referring directly to the topic. People have pretty much summed up my views in retort, anyway please united0wnage point out where I said all cheating is gay.

(Just to restate) Cheating in an MMO to increase skills is far different than directly cheating against other players.

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:25, topic:281590”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=372014.msg2811612#msg2811612 date=1244041725]

You’re a fag because you use a mod. And you also talk out of your ass saying most people do.

Are you talking to united0wnage?

to everyone that needs to use a hack or mod to increase their multiplayer ability, if you cant play properly go home whats the point in beating someone if you didnt do it fairly you should get no sense of achievement out of that
[/quote]

Ok lets go to the extreme:

The best play on a game gets a mod and it makes him better, you call him a fag and a sore loser even though he has never lost a game?[/quote]

But if the best player has never lost a game, then there is no need for him to mod his console because it will not benefit him.

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @united0wnage united0wnage
item.description:
@united0wnage wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:29, topic:281590”][quote author=united0wnage link=topic=372014.msg2811559#msg2811559 date=1244038694]
If you all say cheating is “gay” then why are you on a site dedicated to hacking runescape/making bots? rofl
[/quote]

I never said i had a fucking lag switch. rofl. I don’t even use my mod unless someone uses one on me first.

There is a difference between botting a mmorpg and using lag switches on a ps3/xbox360 game.
Rs cheating saves us time so we can have a real life while lag switches etc. are just for losers that cannot play a game well.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

united0wnage:

If you all say cheating is “gay” then why are you on a site dedicated to hacking runescape/making bots? rofl

There is a difference between botting a mmorpg and using lag switches on a ps3/xbox360 game.
Rs cheating saves us time so we can have a real life while lag switches etc. are just for losers that cannot play a game well.

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

I think we should make a distinction in our definitions of cheating. ITT, cheating refers to having actions/abilities which normal players cannot (i.e. bots). In RS cheating, we’re simply automating those actions. In terms of things we have access to in RS cheating, we have no advantage over regular RS players.

Read full topic
item.source: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?

item.title: What're your views on modding/hacking online multiplayer on the 360/ps3?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:26, topic:281590”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=372014.msg2811622#msg2811622 date=1244042085]

You’re a fag because you use a mod. And you also talk out of your ass saying most people do.

Are you talking to united0wnage?

to everyone that needs to use a hack or mod to increase their multiplayer ability, if you cant play properly go home whats the point in beating someone if you didnt do it fairly you should get no sense of achievement out of that

Ok lets go to the extreme:

The best play on a game gets a mod and it makes him better, you call him a fag and a sore loser even though he has never lost a game?
[/quote]
no but he should no longer have any sense of achievement at what he does, and you arent the best player on a game so it doesnt matter. Effectively you cheat, you are just scared of losing[/quote]

So we cheat at runescape because we are scared of losing? what happens if they don’t give a shit if they lose.

Read full topic
